subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: For Rees - Crystal Enhancer

full_text:

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Where can I get my hands on some crystals, and how much do they cost?  What type of store or place would I find them in?
   
  Rees

psfponies <psfponies@...> wrote:
          Rees

Any clear Quartz is good for bring energy into a room. Looks like 
the crystal enhancer they are putting into the MiniBox is an Asian 
quartz crystal wand. A wand emits both positive and negative energy. 
It strongly amplifies energy and focuses it to where it is needed. 

I use a lot of different kinds of crystal when meditating. The one I 
seem to have the strongest communication with are called Lemurian 
Quartz. When I use them they literal start vibrating in my palms. 

Apophyllite is another good crystal for spirit communication but it 
usually only comes in a cluster.

Hope this helps. If you have any other questions on crystal I am a 
huge rock hound and have been using and studying the properties of 
crystal for a long time.

Kay

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Wiliam Clarke <reesclarke_69@...> 
wrote:
>
> what type of crystals would you for spirit communication!
> 
> psfponies <psfponies@...> wrote: Rees
> 
> Crystals are used for channeling the spirits energy. I use 
crystals 
> during meditation and have had great results with spirit 
> communication. I assume by adding the crystal to the Minibox it 
> would increase spirit communication giving the spirit another 
> channel to go though.
> 
> Kay
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Wiliam Clarke <reesclarke_69@> 
> wrote:
> >
> > This is going to sound crazy, but I'll keep my clicking. I don't 
> hear it anymore during the session. I just like an old person when 
> they get use to something, they will keep it. Nothing new. But I 
> am in the market for a Mini Box with the crystal enhancer. Does 
> anybody know what the crystal enhance does? I know that crystal 
> have energy, but what is the enhancer?
> > 
> > Rees
> > 
> > 
> 
> 
> 
>
